content: crochet these exquisite and adorable amigurumi dogs which are a part of our chinese new year series their brushed fur and colour give them a realistic appearance and two different ear and snout options are given so that you can personalize your own dogs see the step-by-step blog post **here** 1 which includes a video showing how to achieve the brushed fur look 1 http //www allaboutami com/chinese-new-year-dog/
